title: anybody else having trouble logging in?
body: i keep either getting the message below, or the error connecting blah blah blah shit, anyone else getting the same feels around here?

replies.body:
I'm getting a similar problem. Mine does this.

http://i.imgur.com/SF6wBFE.png
I had the same error, it went away after I re-added League (patcher, air client, game client etc) to the Windows firewall.

Hi all,

This is a known issue that we are looking into at the moment. It is causing some players to experience timeouts when logging into the platform, or connecting to chat. As a workaround, you should be able to log in if you retry a few times.

There's no ETA at this stage on a fix, but we are giving this a high priority to get resolved.

-Mindstar

We've made a change just now that should resolve this issue for most people.  Please post here if you are still having the issue.

Cheers
-Mindstar

I had a different message which linked me to a useful troubleshooting page. I don't keep a website history, but the short of it was the following.
(SSL/TLS) and (Certificates) were actually separate parts for different problems.
I restarted my PC after (SSL/TLS) and still had problems connecting, but after (Certificates) was able to login properly.

- Open up Internet Explorer (LoL inherits settings from IE).
- Settings > Internet Options > Advanced > Security

(SSL/TLS) Under Security section at bottom
- check Use TLS 1.0
- uncheck  Use SSL 2.0
- uncheck Use SSL 3.0

(Certificates) Under Security section at bottom
- uncheck Check for publisher's certificate revocation
- uncheck Check for server certificate revocation
- uncheck Warn about certificate address mismatch
Its a joke they still use i.e..  also i managed to get in with thereisnourflevel on mac after 15 tries without it
This worked for me. Thank you sir/madame.
Did this and still cant get in on any account... Everyone else in the house if fine.

Thanks bro! This actually worked!

I don't know how you knew this weird shiet, but keep up the good work lol
Can't login, please fix...

I solved this earlier tonight.

1) Open up Internet Explorer
2) Click Internet Option
3) Click Advance
4) Click Reset.

You should be able to login.

Why do these morons use internet explorer? I don't even use it for any form of connectivity purposes when making
software that requires these type of network features. Very noobish!
Thankyou! This worked for me!
internet explorer jesus christ
oh i had this. its because you pinned LoL at that login screen. im assuming you skip the part where you press launch? just search up League on your start menu and click that. let me know if it worked
